help-file.title: RACES
help-file.content:
Your race is defined by the path you choose to take in the Land of Duris. Each race has its own strengths and weaknesses and your race should be chosen carefully. The following races are currently available on Duris DikuMUD:
Human, Barbarian, Drow Elf, Grey Elf, Half-Elf, Mountain Dwarf, Duergar Dwarf, Gnome, Halfling, Ogre, Minotaur, Goblin, Swamp Troll, Thri-Kreen, Centaur, Githyanki, Orc, Storm Giant, Vampire, Lich, Wight, Shadow Beast, Death Knight, Phantom, Shade, Revenant, Harpy
Note: If you are new to Duris, it is recommended that you play a "goodie" race character, as the other sides are designed much more toward highly advanced players. The good side races are as follows: Human, Barbarian, Grey Elf, Half-Elf, Mountain Dwarf, Gnome, Halfling, Centaur and Storm Giant or Harpy.
For more information on each race, type "help <racename>." This will give you a brief description of each race, its strengths and weaknesses, the bonus system that applies to it, and its innate abilities, if any. It will also tell you which classes are available for that race.
For information about the general theme of Duris, with particular attention to the division between good, evil and undead races, type "help racewars."
